name: Martin Septim
info:
• 简体中文名: 马丁·赛普丁
  • 性别: 男
  • 引用来源: https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Martin_Septim_(Oblivion)
detail: Emperor Martin Septim, also known as Brother Martin or simply Martin, is the illegitimate son of Emperor Uriel Septim VII, and is the last Emperor and member of the Septim Dynasty.
